posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: Pichukip

Your Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:31575008 2:30:25 125 0 active

Reason: Trolling, asking for permanent

Length of Ban/Date and Time of Unban: Permanent

What server were you playing?:TTT

Who banned you?: Pharaoh

Why should we unban you?: He was only requesting for a week ban. Its been a week. I took it to the extent in wanting a pity party by asking for a permanent.

I did only request a week, but also requested a demotion since you were warned personally by Gash with a kick and continued to do it to the extent where i had at least 8 pictures of proof of the incident. I would agree to a un-ban atm if he gets demoted or maybe some kind of agreement (dunno atm, what he did to me is still unforgivable).
How come for some reason we knew you were going to make this eventually?
I don't care demote me. I just wanna play! ;O
